data.message: Hello Facebook my Facebook account is hacking ... My password is changing atometically ...then  I using forget password I change my password..then same way my password changed by some one ... So what can I do for save my account ... Please help me

replies.message: Hi there. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2w7uLYT. Hope this helps! -Stephanie

THANKSS .. My account is opened  from the one sim then this sim is lost  then I used another sim ... After few year ...Telecom compani  provided this numbers sim to their subscriber ... This user wants to open Facebook then he tries to open account .... But this number is connected with my Facebook account .. Then he is changing my password  by using forget password then what I have to do????
I need help I forgot password lost account has no e mail how can I get access

Hi Oriefha. If you're having trouble logging into your Facebook account, here are a few things to try first: http://bit.ly/2waAAon. You can also learn how to regain access to your account here: http://bit.ly/2hlPYvq. Additionally, if the problem continues, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2yhWEOg. -Tenaya

Hello Facebook I didn't use that simcard from which this account is made ..now I keep email account and remove phone number  then  from that that phone number from which it is made can change the password of my Facebook account ..
my account hacked by someone i need help

We're sorry to hear this, Bakhtawar. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2xu5NpC. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2xkJRho. -Jessica
please send me the detail how i can recover my account
